TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Tgleq, title = Tgleq, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tgleq} }

S.FORM: Tgleq Itiniay i Fuxing Cen no Taoyuan ko Tgleq a niyaro', 25 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 99 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 93% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 92 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 7% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 7 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal90%, Amis1%, Truku1%, roma1%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.

Tgleq Itiniay i Foxing Cen no Taoyoan ko Tgleq a niyaro', 25 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 99 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 93% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 92 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 7% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 7 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal90%, Amis1%, Troko1%, roma1%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.
